channel.title: How much better is srl/scar
channel.description: is it better as in less errors easier to auto with..what makes it better than using jus scar because i know that scar is a color picker .does srl go tha same way or does it go kinda off a larger picture or jus off 1 single id with a certian radius?i dont know jus asking

item.title: How much better is srl/scar
item.dc:creator: @Ca1lum Ca1lum
item.description:
@Ca1lum wrote:

Thnk’s guys helped me to i was gonna post that also:D

Read full topic

item.title: How much better is srl/scar
item.dc:creator: @icefire908 icefire908
item.description:
@icefire908 wrote:

Actually everything in SRL can be done with SCAR, you would just need to write it out longer, however SRL makes it a lot easier to perform human like functions/ solve randoms.

Yes I would say Using SCAR / SRL is better than just using SCAR , UNLESS! you are good enough to make you’re own kick ass script that is includess (which I highly doubt).

Take for example, Mouse (in SRL) it’s very human like but it is made out of the basic things in scar It’s merely a combination of basic procedures such as HoldMouse, MoveMouse, ReleaseMouse. It’s all the same thing if you think about it; but just using ClickMouse would get you banned from detection.

Read full topic

item.title: How much better is srl/scar
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Lets say Scar is a rubiks cube and SRL can help solve the rubiks cube. Sure Scar can do it itself, but SRL makes it easier.

Metaphors ftw

Read full topic

item.title: How much better is srl/scar
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:12, topic:71265”]Think of it this way, SCAR is the can and SRL is the juice in the can, SCAR by it’s self without SRL can function properly but everyone likes the can to be full of juice.[/quote]That was such a lame metaphor that I lol’d.

Read full topic

item.title: How much better is srl/scar
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Rune Hacker, post:8, topic:71265”]Scar can still do a lot, but srl just opens up new opportunity because it has A LOT of functions that come in handy. Its like choosing between a knife and a knife set, a lot more you can do with a knife set (sorry for the stupud metaphor, couldnt think of anything)[/quote]The way you thought of a knife set before anything else scares me just a little bit…

Read full topic

item.title: How much better is srl/scar
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

I only use srl for basic functions like for moving the mouse and clicking the mouse. SRL is just a bunch of procedures that are pre-made by soemone else to make it easier for you. Like there is a built in bank finder and opener, but ide rather make my own procedure to do it. Thats all SRL is, a bunch of pre-made procedures. (at least, im pretty sure this is right)

Read full topic
